meanings.definition: The quality or state of being ditzy.
meanings.sent1: Her ditzinesses made her forget where she put her keys.
meanings.sent2: I couldn't help but laugh at her ditzinesses during the meeting.
meanings.sent3: Despite her ditzinesses, she always manages to brighten up the room.
meanings.sent4: Her ditzinesses were like a cloud of confusion following her everywhere.
meanings.sent5: The ditzinesses of the character in the movie were quite entertaining.

meanings.definition: The behavior or characteristic of being scatterbrained or absent-minded.
meanings.sent1: His ditzinesses often led to hilarious misunderstandings.
meanings.sent2: She apologized for her ditzinesses and tried to focus more.
meanings.sent3: The ditzinesses of the professor sometimes resulted in amusing class moments.
meanings.sent4: In the chaos of the party, her ditzinesses stood out like a neon sign.
meanings.sent5: The ditzinesses of the detective made the mystery even more intriguing.
